summary: CONSUMER PURCHASED VEHICLE NEW ON 04/30/01.  WHILE DRIVING ON A DAILY BASIS, CONSUMER WOULD EXPERIENCE NAUSEA, BURNING EYES, SEVERE HEADACHES AND STOMACH CRAPS.  PHYSICIAN DIAGNOSED CONSUMER WITH CARBON MONOXIDE POISONING.  DEALER DIAGNOSED AND REPLACED EGR VALVE AS CAUSE OF ILLNESS.  CONSUMER BELIEVES THAT EGR VALVE IS LEAKING AGAIN, BECAUSE SYMPTOMS HAVE RESURFACED. TS
